attributes.additional_details: due to people suffering from anxiety, depression,epilepsy,stress,insomnia and many more health problems, users of weed and past users can agree that using this drug decreases pain,inflament and stress due to its effects caused by thc thousands of citizens of the uk have been arrested and put behind bars for using a drug to relieve them of there pain. not only legalising weed would help health issues it would bring more money to the economy and push our crime rates that slight bit lower
